verbs.description: [ARG0: WASHINGTON] ( AP ) -- [V: Facing] [ARG1: critical decisions in the Russia investigation] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] has hired Emmet Flood , a veteran attorney who represented Bill Clinton during his impeachment process .
